headline: Vulcan Materials (VMC) Margin Expansion Reinforces Bullish Narrative Despite Below-Average Earnings Growth
summary: Vulcan Materials (VMC) delivered earnings growth of 11% per year over the past five years, but recent earnings have cooled to 3.8%, trailing both the company’s historical average and the broader US market’s 15.7% growth rate. Net profit margins ticked up to 12.6% from last year’s 12.2%, providing some cushion, while revenue is forecast to grow at a 6.7% annual rate and earnings are expected to rise by about 11.1% per year. Investors now face a classic balancing act between Vulcan’s strong...

headline: 3 Inflated Industrials Stocks We Find Risky
summary: The stocks featured in this article have all approached their 52-week highs. When these price levels hit, it typically signals strong business execution, positive market sentiment, or significant industry tailwinds.

headline: Vulcan Materials Co (VMC) Q3 2025 Earnings Call Highlights: Strong EBITDA Growth and Strategic ...
